Class# UITabAccessory

iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac Catalyst 26.0+

```
@MainActor
class UITabAccessory
```

## [Topics](/documentation/UIKit/UITabAccessory#topics)

### [Creating a tab accessory](/documentation/UIKit/UITabAccessory#Creating-a-tab-accessory)

[`init(contentView: UIView)`](/documentation/uikit/uitabaccessory/init(contentview:))Creates a new accessory with the specified content view.### [Accessing the content view](/documentation/UIKit/UITabAccessory#Accessing-the-content-view)

[`var contentView: UIView`](/documentation/uikit/uitabaccessory/contentview)The content view of the accessory.### [Specifying the tab accessory environment](/documentation/UIKit/UITabAccessory#Specifying-the-tab-accessory-environment)

### [Container view controllers](/documentation/UIKit/UITabAccessory#Container-view-controllers)

[Creating a custom container view controller](/documentation/uikit/creating-a-custom-container-view-controller)Create a composite interface by combining content from one or more view controllers with other custom views.[`class UISplitViewController`](/documentation/uikit/uisplitviewcontroller)A container view controller that implements a hierarchical interface.[`class UINavigationController`](/documentation/uikit/uinavigationcontroller)A container view controller that defines a stack-based scheme for navigating hierarchical content.[`class UINavigationBar`](/documentation/uikit/uinavigationbar)Navigational controls that display in a bar along the top of the screen, usually in conjunction with a navigation controller.[`class UINavigationItem`](/documentation/uikit/uinavigationitem)The items that a navigation bar displays when the associated view controller is visible.[`class UITabBarController`](/documentation/uikit/uitabbarcontroller)A container view controller that manages a multiselection interface, where the selection determines which child view controller to display.[`class UITabBar`](/documentation/uikit/uitabbar)A control that displays one or more buttons in a tab bar for selecting between different subtasks, views, or modes in an app.[`class UITabBarItem`](/documentation/uikit/uitabbaritem)An object that describes an item in a tab bar.[`class UITab`](/documentation/uikit/uitab)An object that manages a tab in a tab bar.[`class UISearchTab`](/documentation/uikit/uisearchtab)A tab subclass that represents the systemâ€™s search tab.[`class UITabGroup`](/documentation/uikit/uitabgroup)An object that manages a collection of tab objects.[`class UIPageViewController`](/documentation/uikit/uipageviewcontroller)A container view controller that manages navigation between pages of content, where a subview controller manages each page.
